info.name: dis.4chan.org - ThisDis style
info.description: Green and green and more green. Funny, it didn't look this green on my ThinkPad...
info.additionalInfo:
Built to accommodate ThisIgnore (http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/103710) which adds 'hide post' and 'hide thread' links for saving /prog/ from spam. One bit at a time.

If people like it, I'll figure out how to do some colour variants.

Intended fonts: Consolas, Segoe UI, and Century Gothic.
